document_title: Author Correction: To boldly go where no microRNAs have gone before: spaceflight impact on risk for small-for-gestational-age infants
summary_full: This document is an author correction for a previously published article titled "To boldly go where no microRNAs have gone before: spaceflight impact on risk for small-for-gestational-age infants." The correction pertains to the Acknowledgement section, where a funding source was omitted. Specifically, it was noted that L.I.G. was supported by the US Army Medical Research Command (award W81XWH2110402). The original article has been updated to include this information.
key_findings: An omission in the Acknowledgement section of the original article has been corrected.
The US Army Medical Research Command (award W81XWH2110402) provided support for L.I.G.
conclusions: The author correction ensures complete and accurate acknowledgment of funding sources for the research presented in the original article.
impact_statement: This correction ensures proper attribution of research support, maintaining the integrity of scientific publications.
